content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR PERSONNEL SUB AREA--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

PersonnelSubAreaID      AS PersonnelSubAreaKey,
PersonnelSubAreaCode    AS PersonnelSubAreaCode,
Description             AS PersonnelSubAreaDesc,
IsActive                AS IsActive,
IngestionDate           AS IngestionDate,
ValidTo                 AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_fact_sickness]

GO
